name: $sequence
desc: Returns: Sequence in which the items appear on the invoice.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Sequence in which the items appear on the invoice.

name: $priceComponent
desc: Returns: The price for a ChargeItem may be calculated as a base price with surcharges/deductions that apply in certain conditions. A ChargeItemDefinition resource that defines the prices, factors and conditions that apply to a billing code is currently under development. The priceComponent element can be used to offer transparency to the recipient of the Invoice as to how the prices have been calculated.
